steps.html_instructions: Head west on McCallum Rd/AC6 toward Kovil Veediya

Make a U-turn at Kovil Veediya
Pass by Premasiri Book Shop (on the left)
At the roundabout, take the 1st exit onto T. B. Jayah Mawatha
T. B. Jayah Mawatha turns slightly left and becomes Maradana Rd/AC19
Turn right onto Sri Sangaraja Mawatha

Continue onto New Pradeepa Mawatha Rd/A1
Continue to follow A1
Pass by Zeenath Trading Pvt Ltd (on the right in 600m)
Turn left onto Baseline Rd/Dr Danister De Silva Mawatha/A1
Take the Colombo - Katunayake Expressway ramp
Keep right to continue on Colombo - Katunayake Expy

Continue onto Colombo - Katunayake Expy/E03
Toll road
At Primo @ BIA, continue onto Canada Friendship Rd/AB9

Continue onto Katunayake-Veyangoda Road/KEPZ Rd/B208
Continue to follow B208
Pass by Tropical Findings Private Limited (on the left in 450m)

Turn left at Raadhiâs Family Restaurant onto New Ham Rd
Pass by Parking lot (on the right)

Turn left at Tiger Mart to stay on New Ham Rd
Pass by Dinesh Work Shop (on the right)

Turn left at CO-OP Super onto Divulapitiya Rd/Ekala - Kotadeniyawa Rd/Kurunegala Rd/B111
Continue to follow Ekala - Kotadeniyawa Rd/B111
Pass by Nalanda (Girls') Central College (on the right in 450m)

At Divulapitiya Roundabout, take the 2nd exit onto Negombo - Mirigama Rd/B324
Pass by Divulapitiya (on the right)

Turn left at SOLVO Architecture onto Pasyala - Giriulla Rd/AB29
Pass by Abans Mirigama Unlimited (on the right)

Slight left
Toll road

Continue onto Central Expressway/E04
Toll road

Turn right at C & A Vip onto Ambepussa - Kurunegala - Trincomalee Hwy/Ambepussa - Trincomalee Hwy/Kandy Rd/Kurunegala - Dambulla Rd/A6
Continue to follow Ambepussa - Kurunegala - Trincomalee Hwy/Ambepussa - Trincomalee Hwy/Kandy Rd/A6
Pass by Buddhi Auto Service (on the left)

At the roundabout, take the 1st exit onto Ambepussa - Kurunegala - Trincomalee Hwy/Ambepussa - Trincomalee Hwy/Kandy Rd/Kandy - Jaffna Hwy/A6/A9
Continue to follow Ambepussa - Kurunegala - Trincomalee Hwy/Ambepussa - Trincomalee Hwy/Kandy Rd/A6
Pass by Shanika Gold House (on the left)

Turn right at MOVE CAKE onto Inamaluwa - Sigiriya Rd/B162
Pass by Lucky tour (on the left)

Turn left at Sigiriya Budget Taxi Service
Pass by Sigiriya (on the left)

Turn left
Pass by SAUNTER PARADISE (on the right)
Destination will be on the right
